languages.text: "Твой интерес радует меня. Вот, забери это — считай, что за прилежное поведение". {n}Друкари небрежно ссыпает в вам руки вещи, извлеченные им из контейнера.{/n}
"Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Твой интерес радует меня. Вот, забери это — считай, что за прилежное поведение". {n}Друкари небрежно ссыпает в вам руки вещи, извлеченные им из контейнера.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你兴致勃勃的样子让我很开心。来，收下这个，就当做是奖励你的勤勉吧。”{n}玛拉斋一脸漫不经心，将他从容器里取出来的东西丢进你的怀里。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你兴致勃勃的样子让我很开心。来，收下这个，就当做是奖励你的勤勉吧。”{n}玛拉斋一脸漫不经心，将他从容器里取出来的东西丢进你的怀里。{/n}“我们还有最后一个地方要找。既然掠袭者战机里什么都没有，这里也一无所获……那就只剩那一个地方了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「気にしてくれて嬉しいねぇ。ほら、これをやるよ…その熱意に対するご褒美だ」{n}マラズハイは、コンテナから取り出したアイテムを軽くこちらの腕の中へと投げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「気にしてくれて嬉しいねぇ。ほら、これをやるよ…その熱意に対するご褒美だ」{n}マラズハイは、コンテナから取り出したアイテムを軽くこちらの腕の中へと投げる。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Tu interés me complace. Ten, toma esto: considéralo una recompensa por tu diligencia». {n}Marazhai echa descuidadamente en tus manos los objetos que ha extraído del contenedor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tu interés me complace. Ten, toma esto: considéralo una recompensa por tu diligencia». {n}Marazhai echa descuidadamente en tus manos los objetos que ha extraído del contenedor.{/n} «Aún queda un sitio en el que mirar. Ya que no hemos encontrado nada aquí ni en el incursor... es la única opción restante».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « La curiosité dont vous faites preuve est admirable. Tenez, voilà pour vous... Considérez cela comme la récompense de votre investissement. » {n}D'un geste désinvolte, Marazhai lâche dans vos bras tendus les objets récupérés dans le conteneur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La curiosité dont vous faites preuve est admirable. Tenez, voilà pour vous... Considérez cela comme la récompense de votre investissement. » {n}D'un geste désinvolte, Marazhai lâche dans vos bras tendus les objets récupérés dans le conteneur.{/n} « Nous avons encore un dernier endroit à vérifier. Puisque nous n'avons rien trouvé ici ni dans le croiseur... c'est la seule option qui reste. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Euer Interesse gefällt mir. Hier, für Euch – betrachtet es als Lohn für Euren Fleiß." {n}Marazhai lädt alles achtlos bei dir ab, was er aus dem Container geholt hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Euer Interesse gefällt mir. Hier, für Euch – betrachtet es als Lohn für Euren Fleiß." {n}Marazhai lädt alles achtlos bei dir ab, was er aus dem Container geholt hat.{/n} "Wir müssen noch an einem letzten Ort nachschauen. Da wir weder hier noch im Raider irgendwas gefunden haben ... muss er einfach dort sein."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Gösterdiğin ilgi beni memnun ediyor. Hadi, al şunu. Gayretlerin için bir hediye olarak düşün." {n}Marazhai, konteynerden aldığı eşyaları kaygısızca kollarına bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your interest pleases me. Here, take this — consider it a reward for your diligence." {n}Marazhai carelessly dumps the items he retrieved from the container into your arms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gösterdiğin ilgi beni memnun ediyor. Hadi, al şunu. Gayretlerin için bir hediye olarak düşün." {n}Marazhai, konteynerden aldığı eşyaları kaygısızca kollarına bırakıyor.{/n}
